Articles.Content:
Howdy! I think i have discovered the strangest construction trick since the invention of the infini-glider. It is possible to attach things in mid-air. I'll write a tutorial later, for now, just sit back and enjoy the show (Click the image to see the video)

presenting:

Captain Skyhooks "Floating Stuff Parade"

coming soon to an airport near you (bring a spacesuit)

This is all possible in stock without cfg-edits or cheats. Not sure how to do something useful with it, but its a fun thing to play around with. Upcoming projects: Space Stairway, floating walls to surprise aircraft pilots, and a giant swingchair

Update: Tutorial post is in the tutorials section

Edited July 7, 2013 by SirJodelstein
I can see how this is possible with som,e mods, but I never though about trying this with stock. Please explain!
Now i'm not sure if i want this bug fixed, nice video!
There is a demonstration of my technology and I wasn't invited!!?!?!?!?!?

THE POWER OF SCIENCE!

You must teach us your ways, O mystical wizard of game engine exploits!

I liked the whole presentation format, it's like it was a thrill ride or something. Very good job with the setup and synchronization, you should definitely put this on Youtube!
Wow, this was amazing. The presentation was most excellent as well.
Really amazing. You should do youtube videos you really have talent for videodesign.

Construction Tutorial is up. Lets build crazy physics-defying installations in the sky for fun and profit. Don't forget to post images/videos here or elsewhere, i am curious about what you can do with this technique

I do not have a Youtube account, but if anyone wants to post it there, just go ahead and do so. Just link back to this thread and credit the music artist (Adam Firegate, the track is called "Maki", link to https://soundcloud.com/adamfiregate).
It's the most awesome thing I've seen!
